english.segment1: My past won't stop haunting me. In this prison there's a fight between. Who I am and who I used to be
english.segment2: This thorn in my side is a grace. For because of it the flesh and blood of God. Was offered in my place, my place
english.segment3: You fought the fight in me. You chased me down and finished the race. I was blind but now I see. Jesus You kept the faith in me
english.segment4: Where did my best friends go?. In my defense they disappeared. Just like Your friends did to You, oh Lord
english.segment5: But You were there, You gave me strength. So this little one might come to know. The glory of Your name, Your name
english.segment6: You fought the fight in me. You chased me down and finished the race. I was blind but now I see. Jesus You kept the faith in me
english.segment7: Awaiting, set apart like incense to Your heart. A libation I'm pouring out. Empty and beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
english.segment8: You fought the fight in me. You chased me down and finished the race. I was blind but now I see. Jesus You kept the faith in me
english.segment9: You fought the fight in me. You chased me down and finished the race. I was blind but now I see. Jesus You kept the faith in me. Jesus You kept the faith in me. Savior, You kept the faith in me
